targets.expr: (nagios_services_acknowledges_total{job="$job", instance="$instance"} / ignoring(status) (nagios_services_status_total{job="$job", instance="$instance", status="critical"} + ignoring(status) nagios_services_status_total{job="$job", instance="$instance", status="unknown"})) * 100

(nagios_hosts_acknowledges_total{job="$job", instance="$instance"} / ignoring(status) (nagios_hosts_status_total{job="$job", instance="$instance", status="down"} + ignoring(status) nagios_hosts_status_total{job="$job", instance="$instance", status="unreachable"})) * 100
